content: This story transported me to another world! I could almost smell those magical flowers.
Beautifully written. The character development is exceptional.
What a unique take on dragons! I never thought of them as needing help.
This is my favorite version of the classic ball story. The emphasis on kindness over appearance is wonderful.
The depth of emotion in this story is incredible. I was moved to tears.
Sir Percival is an inspiration to us all. Size doesn't matter when it comes to courage!
